Parameters:action – The action taken by the current player

init(params={})[source]¶

Initialize the DouDiZhuPoker game environment with the initialization params.

The initialization is a dict with some options

  1. allcards: the order of all poker cards appearing
  2. record_history: whether to record all history states. if you need call the backward function, please set it to True. default False
  3. start_turn: players[start_turn] is first to take an action

An example of the initialization param is {“start_turn”:2,”record_history”:True}

Parameters:params – the initialization params
Returns:infos, public_state, person_states, private_state

roomai.doudizhu.DouDiZhuPokerInfo module¶

class roomai.doudizhu.DouDiZhuPokerInfo.DouDiZhuPersonState[source]¶

Bases: roomai.common.common.AbstractPersonState

The person state of DouDiZhu game environment

hand_cards¶

The cards in the hand of the corresponding player

class roomai.doudizhu.DouDiZhuPokerInfo.DouDiZhuPokerHandCards(cardstr)[source]¶

The hand cards in the DouDiZhuPoker game.

card_pointrank_count¶

The card_pointrank_count is an array of counts for different card point cardpoint_to_rank = {‘3’:0, ‘4’:1, ‘5’:2, ‘6’:3, ‘7’:4, ‘8’:5, ‘9’:6, ‘T’:7, ‘J’:8, ‘Q’:9, ‘K’:10, ‘A’:11, ‘2’:12, ‘r’:13, ‘R’:14}. If key = “33rR”, card_pointrank_count = [2,0,…,0,1,1], len(card_pointrank_count) = 15

count2num¶

The count2num is an array of the number of the different counts. For example, key = “333rR”, count2num = [0,2,0,1,0]. count2num[1] = 2 denotes that two cards (r and R) appear onces. count2num[3] = 1 that one card(3) appears three times

key¶

The key of HandCards. For example, key = “33rR”.

num_card¶

The number of cards in HandCards. For example, key = “33rR”, num_card = 4

class roomai.doudizhu.DouDiZhuPokerInfo.DouDiZhuPrivateState[source]¶

Bases: roomai.common.common.AbstractPrivateState

keep_cards¶

A DouDiZhuPokerHandCards class about the keep cards

class roomai.doudizhu.DouDiZhuPokerInfo.DouDiZhuPublicState[source]¶

Bases: roomai.common.common.AbstractPublicState

The public state of DouDiZhuPoker

continuous_cheat_num¶

The number of the continuous cheat actions.During the “playing” phase, if is_response is True, the current player need take an valid action with the same pattern as the license action, which was taken by the license player. Unless, he takes the check action. If two continuous cheat actions are taken, is_response will be false, so that the current player needn’t response the license action and can take any valid action

epoch¶

The epoch denotes the count about a player takes an action.

first_player¶

The players[first_player] is first to take an action

is_response¶

is_response. During the “playing” phase, if is_response is True, the current player need take an valid action with the same pattern as the license action, which was taken by the license player. Unless, he takes the check action. If two continuous cheat actions are taken, is_response will be false, so that the current player needn’t response the license action and can take any valid action

keep_cards¶

The keep cards

landlord_candidate_id¶

The candiate landlord player id during the betting_for_be_landlord phase

landlord_id¶

The landlord player id.

license_action¶

The license action. During the “playing” phase, if is_response is True, the current player need take an valid action with the same pattern as the license action, which was taken by the license player. Unless, he takes the check action. If two continuous cheat actions are taken, is_response will be false, so that the current player needn’t response the license action and can take any valid action

license_playerid¶

The license player id. During the “playing” phase, if is_response is True, the current player need take an valid action with the same pattern as the license action, which was taken by the license player. Unless, he takes the check action. If two continuous cheat actions are taken, is_response will be false, so that the current player needn’t response the license action and can take any valid action

phase¶

There are two stages in DouDiZhu, namely 0) betting for being the landlord and 1) playing the game. 0 denotes the betting for being the landlord phase, 1 denotes the playing the game phase.
